description:
Warm neoprene booties for wet put-ins and portages. Super grippy soles increase traction if you happen to find yourself skating on a layer of rock snot. A drainage system sluices out water and prevents puddling inside your boots.

  • 3mm neoprene provides protection and comfort
  • Quick-lace fastening system with adjustable ankle strap
  • Reinforced sole with stiffening mid shank
  • Drainage holes reduce the squelch factor
  • Rubber outsoles are non-marking and slip-resistant
  • Sized in men’s sizes. For a women’s size, subtract one (for women’s size 8, choose size 7). Round up if you are between full sizes
name: Level Six Creek 2.0 Neoprene Boots - Unisex
